title: Show student data sheet when selecting roll number in Backlog Distribution

requirements.text: When a user clicks a roll number in Dashboard > Subject Analysis > Backlog Distribution, ensure the selected student's Student Data Sheet becomes immediately visible (i.e., the page should automatically bring the Student Data Sheet panel into view after selection).

quotes: in backlog distribution also when we click on the roll no the student data should be visible

acceptanceCriteria: Given the user is on the Dashboard in the Subject Analysis tab, when they click any roll number button inside Backlog Distribution, the Student Data Sheet panel is shown for that roll number (or a Student Not Found panel if no match exists).
After clicking a roll number in Backlog Distribution, the UI automatically scrolls so that the Student Data Sheet panel is within the viewport without the user needing to manually scroll.
The existing behavior of selecting a roll number from Subject Analysis (failed students dropdown) continues to work and also results in the Student Data Sheet being brought into view.

constraints: Do not edit files under frontend/src/components/ui (Shadcn UI sources are read-only).
Do not modify frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.ts(x), frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts, or frontend/src/main.tsx (immutable paths).
Keep the backend as-is (no backend changes required for this feature).
nonGoals: Adding new backend persistence for selected students.
Changing how backlog groups are computed or displayed beyond what is needed to make the selected student panel visible.
